fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • The number of white commissioners at the Equality and Human Rights Commission will be 10 out of 14 from December, rather than 10 out of 12 as an article said (‘Hostile environment’ defender appointed to equalities body, 14 November, page 22). • An article about the planned execution of Lisa Montgomery misspelt the first name of her murder victim, Bobbie Jo Stinnett, as Bobby (US government to execute a woman for first time since 1953, 19 October, page 19). • Other recently amended articles include: Death row woman’s clemency plea in jeopardy as lawyers contract Covid-19 EU plans to increase offshore windfarm capacity 25-fold No 10’s narrow corridors thwart social distancing efforts, staff say ‘It’s a silent killer’: fears of legionella grow amid pandemic Raw sewage dumped into English and Welsh beaches ‘2,900 times this year’
